job_title: Senior Support Worker in Camborne, England
pros:
The west team's clients are all very close together so mileage is minimal, enough paid travel time between the people we support. Call duration is always enough so you are able to build a rapport with the service user's, no one is rushed!!
Manager's are friendly, informative and approachable. Training is of a high standard and courses are always available to expand your knowledge. A very good company to work for.

Since joining Karrek i have received invaluable amounts of support from the colleagues and the management team. You are always offered new training opportunities and career development.
Good work/life balance
cons: occasionally having to work long hours
